name: MindKatt
description:
MindKatt is a game in which the protagonists are mentally evolved cats, with robotic suits to achieve compatibility with the human world.
In a dystopian future, cats and humans share the same world, where humans dominate and enslave the Mindkatt, the name they use to describe these evolved cats.
You will enjoy eccentric characters who will not lack combat and action with detailed 3D art that will keep you immersed in the adventure.
MindKatt is not only an action and stealth game, it is also a unique story that is discovered through the game and that tells of the appearance of a new race on Planet Earth and how it manages to coexist with the original race.

Strategy Combat:
With 2 unique styles of its protagonists, Oliver and Jack. Fight where the enviroment, skill and your reflex will tip the balance of your success.

Boss Enemy:
Face complex and varied final bosses.

Special Event:
Through missions you will find different events ranging from traversing the rapids of a river to riding a donkey to climbing a mountain and different puzzles to advance.
